txt.en: 'Now then, let us depart with haste!'

'We have made it, [placeholder].

'Perhaps you and I are worse for the wear, but thankfully, the crofters have made it here unscathed.

'We have much to do in Snowbourn... let us get to it!'
'Our journey has only just begun, [placeholder]... are you prepared to continue aiding the people of the Sutcrofts?'
Instance: The Caravan to Snowbourn
'We have made it, and the crofters are safe... I fear this would not have been possible without your aid!'
The crofters have reached Snowbourn safely
A crofter has fallen!
A crofter has fallen!
Gísling is standing with the crofters at The Raided Crofts.\n\nHaving made it this far, Gísling has asked for your aid in escorting the crofters of Garsfeld to Snowbourn.
Gísling was defeated!

Gísling is walking with the crofters along the road south to Snowbourn.\n\nGísling hopes you can aid him in escorting the crofters of Garsfeld to Snowbourn. However, he fears that Orcs lurk just beyond his sight and threaten to harm his people.
Gísling can be found along the road to Snowbourn.
Talk to Gísling
Escort the crofters of Garsfeld to safety
Talk to Gísling
<rgb=#FF0000>The crofters must survive</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Gísling must not be defeated</rgb>
'Everyone! Be on guard, they come for us!'
'The Orcs have found us, even this close... [placeholder], attack!'
'Everyone! Gather to me, we must make ready to finish our journey to Snowbourn!'
'Onward!'
'They are too many... all of you, run! [placeholder], we must stand and fight!'
At the order of Gísil, you are to aid to the crofters of Garsfeld as they travel south to seek safer shelter within the walls of Snowbourn.
'Ah, good.'
'I hope your rest here was enough, for we must press on!'
'It is possible that we will encounter more resistance from our foes as we near Snowbourn...'
'...but fear not! [placeholder] and I shall defend you to our very last should that occur.'

'We have made it this far, [placeholder], but I fear the road south will be fraught with danger.

'You have done well to deal so severe a blow to our foes near Garsfeld, but the fields to the south may be rife with Orcs.

'Let me gather the crofters, we must set out as soon as we are able!'
